text: She was hired for her beauty, not even asking if she could type. She wrote to the machine like a virtuous woman, with a skill that surpassed that of all the other employees. He was able to deliver more than twenty letters a day. The amazing thing about it was that I could type with my feet, never using my hands. On the first day, that made a bad impression. But the impression was soon overshadowed by other facts: Not only did the secretary have beautiful legs, but she also had a flat belly that made her dream while responding very commercially to clients. FIN
title: La secretaria
author: Jacques Sternberg
